ComicInfo.Summary: Petra and Lucien are back at the destroyed Dayak citadel and are trying to find a way to get to Minea. Andromeda might have found a genetic relation linking Humans, Mineans and Dayaks which, if revealed, would shake the world as we know it and would lead it to extinction or ascension.
